distance_of_time_in_words(from_time, to_time = 0, include_seconds = false)

This method uses current_language to return a localized string.

[Source]

    # File lib/gloc-rails-text.rb, line 16
16:       def distance_of_time_in_words(from_time, to_time = 0, include_seconds = false)
17:         from_time = from_time.to_time if from_time.respond_to?(:to_time)
18:         to_time = to_time.to_time if to_time.respond_to?(:to_time)
19:         distance_in_minutes = (((to_time - from_time).abs)/60).round
20:         distance_in_seconds = ((to_time - from_time).abs).round
21: 
22:         case distance_in_minutes
23:           when 0..1
24:             return (distance_in_minutes==0) ? l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_minute_less_than) : l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_minute_single) unless include_seconds
25:             case distance_in_seconds
26:               when 0..4   then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_second_less_than, 5)
27:               when 5..9   then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_second_less_than, 10)
28:               when 10..19 then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_second_less_than, 20)
29:               when 20..39 then l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_minute_half)
30:               when 40..59 then l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_minute_less_than)
31:               else             l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_minute_single)
32:             end
33: 
34:           when 2..44           then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_minute, distance_in_minutes)
35:           when 45..89          then l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_hour_about_single)
36:           when 90..1439        then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_hour_about, (distance_in_minutes.to_f / 60.0).round)
37:           when 1440..2879      then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_day, 1)
38:           when 2880..43199     then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_day, (distance_in_minutes / 1440).round)
39:           when 43200..86399    then l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_month_about)
40:           when 86400..525959   then lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_month,(distance_in_minutes / 43200).round)
41:           when 525960..1051919 then l(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_year_about)
42:           else                      lwr(:actionview_datehelper_time_in_words_year_over,(distance_in_minutes / 525960).round)
43:         end
44:       end
select_day(date, options = {})

This method has been modified so that a localized string can be appended to the day numbers.

    # File lib/gloc-rails-text.rb, line 61
61:       def select_day(date, options = {})
62:         if options[:use_hidden]
63:           val = date ? (date.kind_of?(Fixnum) ? date : date.day) : ''
64:           hidden_html(options[:field_name] || 'day', val, options)
65:         else
66:           day_options = []
67:           suffix = l :actionview_datehelper_select_day_suffix
68:           
69:           if options.has_key?(:min_date) && options.has_key?(:max_date)
70:             if options[:min_date].year == options[:max_date].year && options[:min_date].month == options[:max_date].month
71:               start_day, end_day = options[:min_date].day, options[:max_date].day
72:             end
73:           end
74:           start_day ||= 1
75:           end_day ||= 31
76:           
77:           start_day.upto(end_day) do |day|
78:             day_options << ((date && (date.kind_of?(Fixnum) ? date : date.day) == day) ?
79:               %(<option value="#{day}" selected="selected">#{day}#{suffix}</option>\n) :
80:               %(<option value="#{day}">#{day}#{suffix}</option>\n)
81:             )
82:           end
83:           select_html(options[:field_name] || 'day', day_options, options)
84:         end
85:       end
select_month(date, options = {})

This method has been modified so that

  • the month names are localized.
  • it uses options: :min_date, :max_date, :start_month, :end_month
  • a localized string can be appended to the month numbers when the :use_month_numbers option is specified.

[Source]

     # File lib/gloc-rails-text.rb, line 91
 91:       def select_month(date, options = {})
 92:         if options[:use_hidden]
 93:           val = date ? (date.kind_of?(Fixnum) ? date : date.month) : ''
 94:           hidden_html(options[:field_name] || 'month', val, options)
 95:         else
 96:           
 97:           unless LOCALIZED_MONTHNAMES.has_key?(current_language)
 98:             LOCALIZED_MONTHNAMES[current_language] = [''] + l(:general_text_month_names)
 99:             LOCALIZED_ABBR_MONTHNAMES[current_language] = [''] + l(:general_text_month_names_abbr)
100:           end
101:           
102:           month_options = []
103:           month_names = options[:use_short_month] ? LOCALIZED_ABBR_MONTHNAMES[current_language] : LOCALIZED_MONTHNAMES[current_language]
104:           
105:           if options.has_key?(:min_date) && options.has_key?(:max_date)
106:             if options[:min_date].year == options[:max_date].year
107:               start_month, end_month = options[:min_date].month, options[:max_date].month
108:             end
109:           end
110:           start_month ||= (options[:start_month] || 1)
111:           end_month ||= (options[:end_month] || 12)
112:           suffix = l :actionview_datehelper_select_month_suffix
113:           
114:           start_month.upto(end_month) do |month_number|
115:             month_name = if options[:use_month_numbers]
116:               "#{month_number}#{suffix}"
117:             elsif options[:add_month_numbers]
118:               month_number.to_s + ' - ' + month_names[month_number]
119:             else
120:               month_names[month_number]
121:             end
122:           
123:             month_options << ((date && (date.kind_of?(Fixnum) ? date : date.month) == month_number) ?
124:               %(<option value="#{month_number}" selected="selected">#{month_name}</option>\n) :
125:               %(<option value="#{month_number}">#{month_name}</option>\n)
126:             )
127:           end
128:           select_html(options[:field_name] || 'month', month_options, options)
129:         end
130:       end
select_year(date, options = {})

This method has been modified so that

  • it uses options: :min_date, :max_date
  • a localized string can be appended to the years numbers.

[Source]

     # File lib/gloc-rails-text.rb, line 135
135:       def select_year(date, options = {})
136:         if options[:use_hidden]
137:           val = date ? (date.kind_of?(Fixnum) ? date : date.year) : ''
138:           hidden_html(options[:field_name] || 'year', val, options)
139:         else
140:           year_options = []
141:           y = date ? (date.kind_of?(Fixnum) ? (y = (date == 0) ? Date.today.year : date) : date.year) : Date.today.year
142:           
143:           start_year = options.has_key?(:min_date) ? options[:min_date].year : (options[:start_year] || y-5)
144:           end_year = options.has_key?(:max_date) ? options[:max_date].year : (options[:end_year] || y+5)
145:           step_val = start_year < end_year ? 1 : -1
146:           suffix = l :actionview_datehelper_select_year_suffix
147:           
148:           start_year.step(end_year, step_val) do |year|
149:             year_options << ((date && (date.kind_of?(Fixnum) ? date : date.year) == year) ?
150:               %(<option value="#{year}" selected="selected">#{year}#{suffix}</option>\n) :
151:               %(<option value="#{year}">#{year}#{suffix}</option>\n)
152:             )
153:           end
154:         select_html(options[:field_name] || 'year', year_options, options)
155:         end
156:       end
